data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/Ai6fPQkh7bUfdhiAiQjbFmiMub8.jpg","id":455151,"title":"The Future of Work and Death","original_title":"The Future of Work and Death","overview":"The documentary focuses on how future technology could significantly change the two inevitable features of the human experience: punching the clock and fading away. Scientists, engineers and academics all come together to share their thoughts on the future.","poster_path":"/3W1DqMnh93sl1sSI3fW4455AwI2.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":2.012,"release_date":"2016-09-25","video":false,"vote_average":6.8,"vote_count":8},{"backdrop_path":"/zXWeiuM3Gk5aMlAaXiGaICvSBf4.jpg","id":55689,"title":"Baba Yaga","original_title":"Baba Yaga","overview":"Carroll Baker stars in this psychedelic shocker about a mysterious witch who casts a spell over attractive, youthful fashion photographer Valentina Rosselli. Man","original_title":"Oh! Uomo","overview":"After Prisoners of the war and On the Heights all is Peace, this film concludes Yervant Gianikian and Angela Ricci Lucchi's trilogy on the first world war. From the emblem of totalitarianism to individual physical suffering, the directors use this representation of man's rampaging violence to draw up an anatomical inventory of the damaged body and examine the consequences of the conflict on children, from 1919 to 1921. From the deconstruction to the artificial reconstruction of the human body, they try to understand how humanity can forget itself and perpetuate these horrors.","poster_path":"/etamSWMdih95Q6XSDWA2ROwzbuN.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[99,10752],"popularity":1.723,"release_date":"2004-03-15","video":false,"vote_average":6.583,"vote_count":6},{"backdrop_path":"/vJz09EOGD1OY2AHv0QU3tecGiPP.jpg","id":340746,"title":"The Chronicles of Evil","original_title":"악의 연대기","overview":"A detective accidentally kills a man and disposes of the body to protect his career.
